mapper.select: select reservation_no,guide_subject,user_nick,text_tour_date,reservation_person,text_total_person from guide,users,text,reservation where reservation.user_id=users.user_id and reservation.guide_no=guide.guide_no and text.text_no=guide.text_no

select reservation_no,tour_theme,user_nick,text_tour_date,reservation_person,text_total_person from tour,users,text,reservation where reservation.user_id=users.user_id and reservation.tour_no=tour.tour_no and text.text_no=tour.text_no
mapper.insert: insert into reservation(reservation_no,user_id,guide_no,reservation_person,reservation_check) values((select NVL(max(reservation_no)+1,1) from reservation),#{user_id},#{guide_no}, #{reservation_person},'n')
